sqlMap.update:
update com_email_send_info set
sender_kind = #senderKind#,
sender_id = #senderId#,
receiver_email = #receiverEmail#,
email_send_type = #emailSendType#,
email_content = #emailContent#,
update_date = sysdate(), update_id = #updateId# where email_reg_no = #emailRegNo#
sqlMap.select:
select rownum, a.email_reg_no as emailRegNo, /* 이메일 발송 생성 번호 */ a.email_send_type as emailSendType, /* 이메일 유형 */ a.sender_kind as senderKind, /* 발신자 종류 */ a.sender_id as senderId, /* 발신자 ID */ a.receiver_email as receiverEmail, /* 수신자 email */ a.send_result_date as sendResultDate /* 발송결과일자 */ from( select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as rownum, a.email_reg_no, ( select code_name_kor from com_system_code where concat(system_grp_code, system_code) = a.email_send_type ) as email_send_type, ( select code_name_kor from com_system_code where concat(system_grp_code, system_code) = a.sender_kind ) as sender_kind, a.sender_id, a.receiver_email, ifnull(date_format(a.send_result_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), '') as send_result_date from com_email_send_info a, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R where 1=1
order by a.create_date desc ) a

select count(customer_password) as checkPw from spt_customer_info_profile i /* 일반회원프로파일 */ where 1=1 and i.customer_name_kor = #receiverNmae# and i.customer_email = enc_char_ins(#receiverEmail#,10,'ARIA','spt_customer_info_profile','customer_email',user(),connection_id()) order by i.customer_reg_no desc /* 최근의 탈퇴회원이나 최근에 가입 및 재가입한 회원 */ limit 0,1

select a.customerRegNo, a.receiverNmae from( select admin_profile_reg_no as customerRegNo, admin_name_kor as receiverNmae from com_admin_profile where admin_profile_reg_no = #receiverId# union all select operator_profile_reg_no as customerRegNo, operator_name_kor as receiverNmae from com_company_operator_profile where operator_profile_reg_no = #receiverId# union all select customer_reg_no as customerRegNo, customer_name_kor as receiverNmae from spt_customer_info_profile where customer_reg_no = #receiverId# ) a limit 0,1
